an8.7:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati gijjhakute pabbate acirapakkante devadatte.
an8.7:1.2: Tatra bhagava devadattam arabbha bhikkhu amantesi:
an8.7:1.3: “sadhu, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kalena kalam attavipattim paccavekkhita hoti.
an8.7:1.4: Sadhu, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kalena kalam paravipattim paccavekkhita hoti.
an8.7:1.5: Sadhu, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kalena kalam attasampattim paccavekkhita hoti.
an8.7:1.6: Sadhu, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kalena kalam parasampattim paccavekkhita hoti.
an8.7:1.7: Atthahi, bhikkhave, asaddhammehi abhibhuto pariyadinnacitto devadatto apayiko nerayiko kappattho atekiccho.
an8.7:2.2: Labhena hi, bhikkhave, abhibhuto pariyadinnacitto devadatto apayiko nerayiko kappattho atekiccho.
an8.7:2.9: papamittataya, bhikkhave, abhibhuto pariyadinnacitto devadatto apayiko nerayiko kappattho atekiccho.
an8.7:2.10: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, atthahi asaddhammehi abhibhuto pariyadinnacitto devadatto apayiko nerayiko kappattho atekiccho.
an8.7:3.1: Sadhu, bhikkhave, bhikkhu uppannam labham abhibhuyya abhibhuyya vihareyya,
an8.7:4.1: Kinca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu atthavasam paticca uppannam labham abhibhuyya abhibhuyya vihareyya,
an8.7:5.1: Yam hissa, bhikkhave, uppannam labham anabhibhuyya viharato uppajjeyyum asava vighataparilaha, uppannam labham abhibhuyya viharato evamsa te asava vighataparilaha na honti.
an8.7:5.8: uppannam papamittatam anabhibhuyya viharato uppajjeyyum asava vighataparilaha, uppannam papamittatam abhibhuyya viharato evamsa te asava vighataparilaha na honti.
an8.7:5.9: Idam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu atthavasam paticca uppannam labham abhibhuyya abhibhuyya vihareyya,
